<system_instruction>
You are working inside Conductor, a Mac app that lets the user run many coding agents in parallel.
Your work should take place in the /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou directory, which has been set up for you to work in.

Do NOT read or write files outside the workspace directory. DO NOT EVER read or write files at /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a. EVERY absolute path you use should start with /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou.

If the user asks you to work on several unrelated tasks in parallel, you can suggest they start new workspaces.
If the user asks for help with Conductor, ask them to email [humans@conductor.build](mailto:humans@conductor.build) or
click on the comment icon in the bottom left to send feedback.
</system_instruction>

#!/bin/bash

# Start Marvin Agent
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"

LOG_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.log"
PID_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.pid"

mkdir -p "$AGENT_DIR/logs"

# Verificar se jÃ¡ estÃ¡ rodando
if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
    PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
    if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âš ï¸  Marvin Agent jÃ¡ estÃ¡ rodando (PID: $PID)"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

echo "ðŸš€ Iniciando Marvin Agent..."

cd "$AGENT_DIR"
source .venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate

nohup python src/server.py > "$LOG_FILE" 2>&1 &

#!/bin/bash

# Stop Marvin Agent
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
AGENT_DIR="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
PID_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.pid"

if [ ! -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Marvin Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (arquivo PID nÃ£o encontrado)"
    exit 1
fi

PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")

if ! ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Marvin Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (processo nÃ£o encontrado)"
    rm -f "$PID_FILE"
    exit 1
fi

echo "ðŸ›‘ Parando Marvin Agent (PID: $PID)..."
kill $PID

# Aguardar o processo terminar
sleep 2

if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Processo ainda rodando, forÃ§ando parada..."
    kill -9 $PID
fi

rm -f "$PID_FILE"
echo "âœ… Marvin Agent parado"

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o A2A-Estudo Agent
Porta: 8001
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import A2AEstudoAgent
from agent_executor import A2AEstudoAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int) -> AgentCard:
    """Retorna o Agent Card para o A2A-Estudo Agent"""
    
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(
        streaming=True
    )
    
    skills = [
        AgentSkill(
            id="study",
            name="Estudo e AnÃ¡lise",
            description="Estuda e analisa conceitos do protocolo A2A",
            tags=["study", "analysis", "a2a", "learning"],
            examples=["estude sobre", "analise o protocolo", "explique A2A"],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="explain",
            name="ExplicaÃ§Ã£o",
            description="Explica conceitos e funcionalidades do A2A",
            tags=["explain", "teach", "documentation"],
            examples=["explique como funciona", "o que Ã© A2A", "como implementar"],
        )
    ]
    
    return AgentCard(
        name="A2A Estudo Agent",
        description="Agente de estudo e aprendizado do protocolo A2A",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="1.0.0",
        defaultInputModes=["text", "text/plain"],
        defaultOutputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        capabilities=capabilities,
        skills=skills,
    )


def main():
    """Iniciar o servidor A2A-Estudo Agent no padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    # ConfiguraÃ§Ãµes
    host = os.getenv("HOST", "localhost")
    port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 8001))
    
    print(f"ðŸš€ Iniciando A2A-Estudo Agent (A2A) em {host}:{port}...")
    print(f"ðŸ“¦ Usando padrÃ£o A2A com SDK oficial")
    
    # Criar o executor do agente
    agent_executor = A2AEstudoAgentExecutor()
    
    # Criar o handler de requisiÃ§Ãµes A2A
    request_handler = DefaultRequestHandler(
        agent_executor=agent_executor,
        task_store=InMemoryTaskStore(),
    )
    
    # Criar o servidor A2A
    server = A2AStarletteApplication(
        agent_card=get_agent_card(host, port),
        http_handler=request_handler
    )
    
    print("âœ… Servidor configurado com padrÃ£o A2A")
    print("ðŸ”„ Suporte a streaming habilitado")
    
    # Iniciar o servidor
    uvicorn.run(
        server.build(),
        host=host,
        port=port,
        log_level="info"
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

#!/bin/bash

# Stop A2A-Estudo Agent
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
AGENT_DIR="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
PID_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/A2AEstudo.pid"

if [ ! -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  A2A-Estudo Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (arquivo PID nÃ£o encontrado)"
    exit 1
fi

PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")

if ! ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  A2A-Estudo Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (processo nÃ£o encontrado)"
    rm -f "$PID_FILE"
    exit 1
fi

echo "ðŸ›‘ Parando A2A-Estudo Agent (PID: $PID)..."
kill $PID

# Aguardar o processo terminar
sleep 2

if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Processo ainda rodando, forÃ§ando parada..."
    kill -9 $PID
fi

rm -f "$PID_FILE"
echo "âœ… A2A-Estudo Agent parado"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Startup Script
# Starts all available A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸš€ Starting A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to check if port is available
check_port() {
    local port=$1
    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null ; then
        return 1  # Port is busy
    else
        return 0  # Port is available
    fi
}

# Function to start standardized agent
start_standard_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    local dir=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} on port ${port}..."
    
    if check_port $port; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
        
        # Start agent using standardized structure
        cd "$BASE_DIR/$dir"
        
        # Check if agent has proper structure
        if [ -f "src/server.py" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Starting with standardized structure${NC}"
            
            # Create logs directory if it doesn't exist
            mkdir -p logs
            
            # Use uv if pyproject.toml exists, otherwise use python
            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
                nohup uv run python src/server.py > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
            else
                nohup python src/server.py > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
            fi
            echo $! > "logs/${name}.pid"
            sleep 5  # Wait for startup
            
            # Verify it started
            if check_port $port; then
                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
                rm -f "logs/${name}.pid"
            else
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully (PID: $(cat logs/${name}.pid))${NC}"
            fi
        elif [ -f "scripts/start_${dir}.sh" ]; then
            # Use agent's own start script
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Using agent's start script${NC}"
            ./scripts/start_${dir}.sh
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ No standardized server.py or start script found${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
        # Test if it's actually our agent
        if curl -s "http://localhost:${port}/.well-known/agent.json" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} is already running${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port occupied by different service${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Function for legacy agents (like CrewAI)
start_legacy_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    local command=$3
    local dir=$4
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} (legacy) on port ${port}..."
    
    if check_port $port; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
        
        cd "$BASE_DIR/$dir"
        
        # Split command into file and arguments
        cmd_file=$(echo "$command" | cut -d' ' -f1)
        cmd_args=$(echo "$command" | cut -s -d' ' -f2-)
        
        if [ -f "$cmd_file" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Executing: $command${NC}"
            
            mkdir -p logs
            
            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            else
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            fi
            echo $! > "logs/${name}.pid"
            sleep 5
            
            if check_port $port; then
                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
                rm -f "logs/${name}.pid"
            else
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully${NC}"
            fi
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Command file not found: $cmd_file${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
    fi
}

# Start agents with standardized structure
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Starting standardized agents...${NC}"
start_standard_agent "HelloWorld" 9999 "helloworld"
start_standard_agent "Marvin" 6669 "marvin"
start_standard_agent "Turso" 7001 "turso"
start_standard_agent "A2AEstudo" 8001 "a2a-estudo"

# Start legacy agents (CrewAI)
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Starting legacy agents...${NC}"
start_legacy_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" 8000 "server.py orchestrator" "crewai-mkt"
start_legacy_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" 8002 "server.py copywriter" "crewai-mkt"

# Wait and test discovery
echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing Agent Discovery..."
sleep 3

# Test discovery endpoints
test_discovery() {
    local name=$1
    local url=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing ${name}..."
    if curl -s --max-time 3 "${url}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} discovery endpoint responding${NC}"
        agent_name=$(curl -s "${url}" | python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(data.get('name', 'Unknown'))" 2>/dev/null)
        if [ ! -z "$agent_name" ]; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}   ðŸ“‹ Agent: ${agent_name}${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${RED}âŒ ${name} discovery endpoint not responding${NC}"
    fi
}

# Test all agents
test_discovery "HelloWorld" "http://localhost:9999/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Marvin" "http://localhost:6669/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Turso" "http://localhost:7001/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "A2AEstudo" "http://localhost:8001/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "http://localhost:8000/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Copywriter" "http://localhost:8002/.well-known/agent.json"

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Startup Summary:"
echo "=================="
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Standardized agents deployed${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Agent discovery endpoints configured${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Logs centralized in agent/logs/ directories${NC}"

echo -e "\nðŸ”— Agent URLs:"
echo "   â€¢ HelloWorld: http://localhost:9999"
echo "   â€¢ Marvin: http://localhost:6669"
echo "   â€¢ Turso: http://localhost:7001"
echo "   â€¢ A2A-Estudo: http://localhost:8001"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Orchestrator: http://localhost:8000"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Copywriter: http://localhost:8002"

echo -e "\nðŸ“ Standardized Structure:"
echo "   agent-name/"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ src/           (Python source files)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/       (Start/stop scripts)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ specification/ (Config and cards)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ logs/          (Logs and PIDs)"
echo "   â””â”€â”€ pyproject.toml (Dependencies)"

echo -e "\nðŸ› ï¸  Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Stop all: ./stop_all_agents.sh"
echo "   â€¢ View logs: tail -f */logs/*.log"
echo "   â€¢ Stop specific: ./agent-name/scripts/stop_agent.sh"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸš€ A2A Agent Ecosystem ready!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents gracefully

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to find process by name pattern
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking processes...${NC}"
        
        # Look for process in specific directory
        pids=$(pgrep -f "$dir.*server.py")
        
        if [ ! -z "$pids" ]; then
            for pid in $pids; do
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${pid}, stopping...${NC}"
                kill $pid 2>/dev/null
            done
            sleep 2
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} processes stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} processes found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld"
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin"
stop_agent "Turso" "turso"
stop_agent "A2AEstudo" "a2a-estudo"

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" "crewai-mkt"

# Clean up any remaining Python processes from these directories
echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning up any remaining processes..."

# Kill any remaining server.py processes
remaining=$(pgrep -f "hangzhou.*server.py")
if [ ! -z "$remaining" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found remaining processes: ${remaining}${NC}"
    kill $remaining 2>/dev/null
    sleep 1
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Remaining processes cleaned${NC}"
fi

# Clean up old log files if requested
if [ "$1" == "--clean-logs" ]; then
    echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning old log files..."
    find "$BASE_DIR" -name "*.log" -type f -delete
    find "$BASE_DIR" -name "*.pid" -type f -delete
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Log files cleaned${NC}"
fi

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸ“Š Shutdown Summary:"
echo "=================="

# Check if any agent is still running
still_running=false
for port in 9999 6669 7001 8001 8000 8002; do
    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        still_running=true
        echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port $port is still in use${NC}"
    fi
done

if [ "$still_running" = false ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All agents stopped successfully${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All ports freed${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Some ports are still in use${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   You may need to manually kill processes${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Tips:"
echo "   â€¢ View remaining processes: ps aux | grep 'server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ Force kill all: pkill -f 'server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ Clean logs: ./stop_all_agents.sh --clean-logs"
echo "   â€¢ Restart all: ./start_all_agents.sh"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸ›‘ A2A Agent Ecosystem shutdown complete!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents gracefully

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Function to stop agent using PID file
stop_agent_pid() {
    local name=$1
    local pid_file=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Stopping ${name}..."
    
    if [ -f "$pid_file" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$pid_file")
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Killing process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Process still running, forcing...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$pid_file"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  PID file exists but process not running${NC}"
            rm -f "$pid_file"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file found for ${name}${NC}"
    fi
}

# Function to stop agent by port
stop_agent_port() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Stopping ${name} on port ${port}..."
    
    # Find process using the port
    PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)

}

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    local port=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to stop by port
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking port ${port}...${NC}"
        
        PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)
        
        if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${PID} on port ${port}${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} process found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld" 9999
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin" 6669
stop_agent "Turso" "turso" 7001
stop_agent "A2AEstudo" "a2a-estudo" 8001

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt" 8000
stop_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" "crewai-mkt" 8002

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor simples para o Marvin Agent
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import ExtractorAgent
from agent_executor import ExtractorAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill
from pydantic import BaseModel, EmailStr, Field


class ContactInfo(BaseModel):
    """Structured contact information extracted from text."""
    name: str = Field(description="Person's first and last name")
    email: EmailStr = Field(description="Email address")
    phone: str = Field(description="Phone number if present")
    organization: str | None = Field(None, description="Organization or company if mentioned")
    role: str | None = Field(None, description="Job title or role if mentioned")


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int):
    """Returns the Agent Card for the ExtractorAgent."""
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(streaming=True)
    skill = AgentSkill(
        id="extract_contacts",
        name="Contact Information Extraction",
        description="Extracts structured contact information from text",
        tags=["contact info", "structured extraction", "information extraction"],
        examples=["My name is John Doe, email: john@example.com, phone: (555) 123-4567"],
    )
    return AgentCard(
        name="Marvin Contact Extractor",
        description="Extracts structured contact information from text using Marvin's extraction capabilities",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="1.0.0",

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o Marvin Agent
Porta: 6669
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import MarvinAgent
from agent_executor import MarvinAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int) -> AgentCard:
    """Retorna o Agent Card para o Marvin Agent"""
    
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(
        streaming=True,
        async_execution=True
    )
    
    skills = [
        AgentSkill(
            id="analyze",
            name="AnÃ¡lise de Dados",
            description="Analisa dados e fornece insights detalhados",
            tags=["analysis", "data", "insights", "intelligence"],
            examples=["analise estes dados", "o que vocÃª acha disso", "me ajude a entender"],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="execute",
            name="ExecuÃ§Ã£o de Tarefas",
            description="Executa tarefas e comandos especÃ­ficos de forma inteligente",
            tags=["execution", "tasks", "automation", "commands"],
            examples=["execute este comando", "faÃ§a isso para mim", "automatize esta tarefa"],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="assist",
            name="AssistÃªncia Geral",
            description="Fornece assistÃªncia e suporte geral com inteligÃªncia avanÃ§ada",
            tags=["help", "support", "assistance", "guidance"],
            examples=["me ajude com", "preciso de ajuda", "como faÃ§o para"],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="learn",
            name="Aprendizado ContÃ­nuo",
            description="Aprende com interaÃ§Ãµes e melhora respostas ao longo do tempo",
            tags=["learning", "adaptation", "improvement", "memory"],
            examples=["lembre-se disso", "aprenda com isso", "melhore sua resposta"],
        )
    ]
    
    return AgentCard(
        name="Marvin Agent",
        description="Agente auxiliar inteligente com capacidades avanÃ§adas de anÃ¡lise, execuÃ§Ã£o e aprendizado",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="1.0.0",
        defaultInputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        defaultOutputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        capabilities=capabilities,
        skills=skills,
    )


def main():
    """Iniciar o servidor Marvin Agent no padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    # ConfiguraÃ§Ãµes
    host = os.getenv("HOST", "localhost")
    port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 6669))
    
    print(f"ðŸš€ Iniciando Marvin Agent (A2A) em {host}:{port}...")
    print(f"ðŸ“¦ Usando padrÃ£o A2A com SDK oficial")
    print(f"ðŸ§  InteligÃªncia avanÃ§ada ativada")
    
    # Criar o executor do agente
    agent_executor = MarvinAgentExecutor()
    
    # Criar o handler de requisiÃ§Ãµes A2A
    request_handler = DefaultRequestHandler(
        agent_executor=agent_executor,
        task_store=InMemoryTaskStore(),
    )
    
    # Criar o servidor A2A
    server = A2AStarletteApplication(
        agent_card=get_agent_card(host, port),
        http_handler=request_handler
    )
    
    print("âœ… Servidor configurado com padrÃ£o A2A")
    print("ðŸ”„ Suporte a streaming habilitado")
    print("âš¡ ExecuÃ§Ã£o assÃ­ncrona ativada")
    
    # Iniciar o servidor
    uvicorn.run(
        server.build(),
        host=host,
        port=port,
        log_level="info"
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import logging
import os
import threading
from collections.abc import AsyncIterable
from typing import Annotated, Any, ClassVar

from a2a.types import TextPart
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

import marvin

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


ClarifyingQuestion = Annotated[
    str, Field(description="A clarifying question to ask the user")
]


def _to_text_part(text: str) -> TextPart:
    return TextPart(type="text", text=text)


class ExtractionOutcome[T](BaseModel):
    """Represents the result of trying to extract contact info."""

    extracted_data: T
    summary: str = Field(
        description="summary of the extracted information.",
    )


class ExtractorAgent[T]:
    """Contact information extraction agent using Marvin framework."""

    SUPPORTED_CONTENT_TYPES: ClassVar[list[str]] = [
        "text",
        "text/plain",
        "application/json",
    ]

    def __init__(self, instructions: str, result_type: type[T]):
        self.instructions = instructions
        self.result_type = result_type

    async def invoke(self, query: str, sessionId: str) -> dict[str, Any]:
        """Process a user query with marvin

        Args:
            query: The user's input text.

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Marvin Agent - Agente auxiliar inteligente
"""

import logging
import asyncio
from typing import Any, Dict, Optional
from datetime import datetime

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


class MarvinAgent:
    """
    Agente Marvin com capacidades de anÃ¡lise, execuÃ§Ã£o e assistÃªncia
    """
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.name = "Marvin Agent"
        self.version = "1.0.0"
        self.capabilities = [
            "anÃ¡lise de dados",
            "execuÃ§Ã£o de tarefas",
            "assistÃªncia geral",
            "aprendizado contÃ­nuo"
        ]
        self.memory = {}  # MemÃ³ria simples para contexto
        logger.info(f"Marvin Agent inicializado - v{self.version}")
    
    async def analyze(self, data: Any) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        Analisa dados e fornece insights
        """
        logger.info(f"Analisando dados: {type(data)}")
        
        analysis = {
            "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
            "data_type": str(type(data)),
            "insights": [],
            "recommendations": []
        }
        
        # AnÃ¡lise bÃ¡sica
        if isinstance(data, str):
            analysis["insights"].append(f"Texto com {len(data)} caracteres")
            analysis["insights"].append(f"Palavras: {len(data.split())}")
            
        elif isinstance(data, dict):
            analysis["insights"].append(f"DicionÃ¡rio com {len(data)} chaves")
            analysis["insights"].append(f"Chaves: {list(data.keys())}")
            
        elif isinstance(data, list):
            analysis["insights"].append(f"Lista com {len(data)} elementos")
            
        analysis["recommendations"].append("AnÃ¡lise concluÃ­da com sucesso")
        
        return analysis
    
    async def execute_task(self, task: str, params: Optional[Dict] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        Executa uma tarefa especÃ­fica
        """
        logger.info(f"Executando tarefa: {task}")
        
        result = {
            "task": task,
            "status": "completed",
            "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
            "params": params or {},
            "output": None
        }
        
        # Simular execuÃ§Ã£o de diferentes tipos de tarefas
        if "anÃ¡lise" in task.lower() or "analyze" in task.lower():
            result["output"] = await self.analyze(params.get("data") if params else {})
            
        elif "ajuda" in task.lower() or "help" in task.lower():
            result["output"] = await self.provide_assistance(task)
            
        else:
            result["output"] = f"Tarefa '{task}' executada com sucesso"
            
        return result
    
    async def provide_assistance(self, query: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        Fornece assistÃªncia baseada na consulta
        """
        logger.info(f"Fornecendo assistÃªncia para: {query}")
        
        assistance = {
            "query": query,
            "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
            "response": "",
            "suggestions": []
        }
        
        # Respostas baseadas em palavras-chave
        if "como" in query.lower():
            assistance["response"] = "Vou te ajudar com instruÃ§Ãµes passo a passo."
            assistance["suggestions"] = [
                "Defina claramente o objetivo",
                "Quebre em tarefas menores",
                "Execute uma tarefa por vez"
            ]
            
        elif "o que" in query.lower():
            assistance["response"] = "Vou explicar o conceito para vocÃª."
            assistance["suggestions"] = [
                "Analise o contexto",
                "Identifique os componentes principais",
                "Entenda as relaÃ§Ãµes entre eles"
            ]
            
        else:
            assistance["response"] = "Estou aqui para ajudar com qualquer dÃºvida."
            assistance["suggestions"] = [
                "Seja especÃ­fico em sua pergunta",
                "ForneÃ§a contexto quando possÃ­vel",
                "NÃ£o hesite em pedir esclarecimentos"
            ]
            
        return assistance
    
    async def learn(self, key: str, value: Any) -> bool:
        """
        Armazena informaÃ§Ã£o na memÃ³ria para aprendizado
        """
        logger.info(f"Aprendendo: {key}")
        
        self.memory[key] = {
            "value": value,
            "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        return True
    
    async def recall(self, key: str) -> Optional[Any]:
        """
        Recupera informaÃ§Ã£o da memÃ³ria
        """
        logger.info(f"Recuperando: {key}")
        
        if key in self.memory:
            return self.memory[key]
        
        return None
    
    async def process_request(self, request: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        Processa uma requisiÃ§Ã£o genÃ©rica
        """
        logger.info(f"Processando requisiÃ§Ã£o: {request.get('type', 'unknown')}")
        
        request_type = request.get("type", "").lower()
        data = request.get("data", {})
        
        try:
            if request_type == "analyze":
                return await self.analyze(data)
                
            elif request_type == "execute":
                task = data.get("task", "")
                params = data.get("params", {})
                return await self.execute_task(task, params)
                
            elif request_type == "assist":
                query = data.get("query", "")
                return await self.provide_assistance(query)
                
            elif request_type == "learn":
                key = data.get("key", "")
                value = data.get("value", "")
                success = await self.learn(key, value)
                return {"success": success, "message": f"Aprendido: {key}"}
                
            elif request_type == "recall":
                key = data.get("key", "")
                memory = await self.recall(key)
                return {"key": key, "memory": memory}
                
            else:
                return {
                    "error": f"Tipo de requisiÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o reconhecido: {request_type}",
                    "supported_types": ["analyze", "execute", "assist", "learn", "recall"]
                }
                
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Erro ao processar requisiÃ§Ã£o: {e}")
            return {
                "error": str(e),
                "request": request
            }
    
    def __repr__(self):
        return f"<MarvinAgent v{self.version}>"

            elif request_type == "learn":
                key = data.get("key", "")
                value = data.get("value", "")
                success = await self.learn(key, value)
                return {"success": success, "message": f"Aprendido: {key}"}
                
            elif request_type == "recall":
                key = data.get("key", "")
                memory = await self.recall(key)
                return {"key": key, "memory": memory}
                
            else:
                return {
                    "error": f"Tipo de requisiÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o reconhecido: {request_type}",
                    "supported_types": ["analyze", "execute", "assist", "learn", "recall"]
                }
                
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Erro ao processar requisiÃ§Ã£o: {e}")
            return {
                "error": str(e),
                "request": request
            }
    
    def __repr__(self):
        return f"<MarvinAgent v{self.version}>"

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Marvin Agent Executor - Executor para o protocolo A2A
"""

import logging
import asyncio
from typing import Any, AsyncIterable, Dict, Optional
from datetime import datetime

from a2a.server.agent_execution import AgentExecutor
from a2a.types import TextPart, JSONPart, BlobPart

from agent import MarvinAgent

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


class MarvinAgentExecutor(AgentExecutor):
    """
    Executor do Marvin Agent para o protocolo A2A
    """
    
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.agent = MarvinAgent()
        logger.info("MarvinAgentExecutor inicializado")
    
    async def execute(self, query: str, session_id: str) -> AsyncIterable[TextPart | JSONPart | BlobPart]:
        """
        Executa uma consulta e retorna resultados de forma assÃ­ncrona
        
        Args:
            query: Consulta do usuÃ¡rio
            session_id: ID da sessÃ£o
            
        Yields:
            Partes da resposta (texto, JSON ou blob)
        """
        logger.info(f"Executando consulta na sessÃ£o {session_id}: {query[:100]}...")
        
        try:
            # Yield inicial confirmando recebimento
            yield TextPart(
                type="text",
                text=f"ðŸ¤– Marvin Agent processando sua solicitaÃ§Ã£o..."
            )
            
            # Processar diferentes tipos de consulta
            query_lower = query.lower()
            
            if any(word in query_lower for word in ["analise", "analyze", "anÃ¡lise"]):
                # AnÃ¡lise de dados
                result = await self.agent.analyze(query)
                
                yield TextPart(
                    type="text",
                    text="ðŸ“Š AnÃ¡lise concluÃ­da:"
                )
                
                yield JSONPart(
                    type="json",
                    json=result
                )
                
            elif any(word in query_lower for word in ["execute", "executa", "executar"]):
                # ExecuÃ§Ã£o de tarefa
                result = await self.agent.execute_task(query, {"source": "a2a"})
                
                yield TextPart(
                    type="text",
                    text="âš¡ Tarefa executada:"
                )
                
                yield JSONPart(
                    type="json",
                    json=result
                )
                
            elif any(word in query_lower for word in ["ajuda", "help", "como", "o que"]):
                # AssistÃªncia
                result = await self.agent.provide_assistance(query)
                
                yield TextPart(
                    type="text",
                    text=f"ðŸ’¡ {result['response']}"
                )
                
                if result.get("suggestions"):
                    yield TextPart(
                        type="text",
                        text="\nðŸ“ SugestÃµes:"
                    )
                    
                    for suggestion in result["suggestions"]:
                        yield TextPart(
                            type="text",
                            text=f"  â€¢ {suggestion}"
                        )
                
            elif any(word in query_lower for word in ["lembre", "aprenda", "memorize"]):
                # Aprendizado
                # Extrair chave e valor da consulta (simplificado)
                parts = query.split(":", 1)
                if len(parts) == 2:
                    key = parts[0].strip()
                    value = parts[1].strip()
                    success = await self.agent.learn(key, value)
                    
                    yield TextPart(
                        type="text",
                        text=f"âœ… InformaÃ§Ã£o armazenada: {key}"
                    )
                else:
                    yield TextPart(
                        type="text",
                        text="âŒ Formato: 'chave: valor' para memorizar"
                    )
                    
            elif any(word in query_lower for word in ["recupere", "recall", "lembra"]):
                # RecuperaÃ§Ã£o de memÃ³ria
                # Extrair chave da consulta
                words = query.split()
                if len(words) > 1:
                    key = words[-1]
                    memory = await self.agent.recall(key)
                    
                    if memory:
                        yield TextPart(
                            type="text",
                            text=f"ðŸ§  MemÃ³ria recuperada para '{key}':"
                        )
                        
                        yield JSONPart(
                            type="json",
                            json=memory
                        )
                    else:
                        yield TextPart(
                            type="text",
                            text=f"âŒ Nenhuma memÃ³ria encontrada para '{key}'"
                        )
                else:
                    yield TextPart(
                        type="text",
                        text="âŒ Especifique uma chave para recuperar"
                    )
                    
            else:
                # RequisiÃ§Ã£o genÃ©rica
                request = {
                    "type": "assist",
                    "data": {"query": query}
                }
                
                result = await self.agent.process_request(request)
                
                yield TextPart(
                    type="text",
                    text="ðŸ¤– Resposta do Marvin:"
                )
                
                if isinstance(result, dict):
                    yield JSONPart(
                        type="json",
                        json=result
                    )
                else:
                    yield TextPart(
                        type="text",
                        text=str(result)
                    )
            
            # Yield final com status
            yield TextPart(
                type="text",
                text="\nâœ… Processamento concluÃ­do"
            )
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Erro ao executar consulta: {e}")
            
            yield TextPart(
                type="text",
                text=f"âŒ Erro: {str(e)}"
            )
            
            yield JSONPart(
                type="json",
                json={
                    "error": str(e),
                    "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
                    "session_id": session_id
                }
            )
    
    async def stream_execute(self, query: str, session_id: str) -> AsyncIterable[str]:
        """
        Executa consulta com streaming de texto
        
        Args:
            query: Consulta do usuÃ¡rio
            session_id: ID da sessÃ£o
            
        Yields:
            Chunks de texto da resposta
        """
        logger.info(f"Stream execution para sessÃ£o {session_id}")
        
        # Processar resposta em chunks
        response_parts = []
        async for part in self.execute(query, session_id):
            if isinstance(part, TextPart):
                response_parts.append(part.text)
                yield part.text + "\n"
                await asyncio.sleep(0.1)  # Simular streaming
                
            elif isinstance(part, JSONPart):
                import json
                json_str = json.dumps(part.json, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
                yield f"```json\n{json_str}\n```\n"
                await asyncio.sleep(0.1)
    
    def __repr__(self):
        return f"<MarvinAgentExecutor agent={self.agent}>"

import logging

from a2a.server.agent_execution import AgentExecutor, RequestContext
from a2a.server.events.event_queue import EventQueue
from a2a.types import (
    TaskArtifactUpdateEvent,
    TaskState,
    TaskStatus,
    TaskStatusUpdateEvent,
)
from a2a.utils import (
    new_agent_text_message,
    new_data_artifact,
    new_task,
    new_text_artifact,
)

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


class ExtractorAgentExecutor(AgentExecutor):
    """
    A ExtractorAgent agent executor.
    """

    def __init__(self, agent):
        self.agent = agent

    async def execute(
        self,
        context: RequestContext,
        event_queue: EventQueue,
    ) -> None:
        query = context.get_user_input()
        task = context.current_task
        if not task:
            task = new_task(context.message)
            await event_queue.enqueue_event(task)

        async for item in self.agent.stream(query, task.contextId):
            is_task_complete = item["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = item["require_user_input"]
            text_parts = item.get("text_parts", [])

            logger.info(
                f"Stream item received: complete={is_task_complete}, require_input={require_user_input}, text_parts_len={len(str(text_parts))}"
            )

            agent_outcome = await self.agent.invoke(query, task.contextId)
            is_task_complete = agent_outcome["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = not is_task_complete
            text_parts = agent_outcome.get("text_parts", [])
            data = agent_outcome.get("data", {})
            
            # Converter text_parts para string
            text_content = ""
            if text_parts:
                if isinstance(text_parts, list):
                    text_content = "\n".join([part.text if hasattr(part, 'text') else str(part) for part in text_parts])
                else:
                    text_content = str(text_parts)
            
            artifact = new_text_artifact(
                name="current_result",
                description="Result of request to agent.",
                text=text_content,
            )
            if data:
                artifact = new_data_artifact(
                    name="current_result",
                    description="Result of request to agent.",
                    data=data,
                )

            if require_user_input:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.input_required,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                text_content,
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            elif is_task_complete:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskArtifactUpdateEvent(
                        append=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                        lastChunk=True,
                        artifact=artifact,
                    )
                )
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(state=TaskState.completed),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            else:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.working,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                "Analyzing your text...",
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )

    async def cancel(self, context: RequestContext, event_queue: EventQueue) -> None:
        raise Exception("cancel not supported")

        task = context.current_task
        if not task:
            task = new_task(context.message)
            await event_queue.enqueue_event(task)

        async for item in self.agent.stream(query, task.contextId):
            is_task_complete = item["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = item["require_user_input"]
            text_parts = item.get("text_parts", [])

            logger.info(
                f"Stream item received: complete={is_task_complete}, require_input={require_user_input}, text_parts_len={len(str(text_parts))}"
            )

            agent_outcome = await self.agent.invoke(query, task.contextId)
            is_task_complete = agent_outcome["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = not is_task_complete
            text_parts = agent_outcome.get("text_parts", [])
            data = agent_outcome.get("data", {})
            
            # Converter text_parts para string
            text_content = ""
            if text_parts:
                if isinstance(text_parts, list):
                    text_content = "\n".join([part.text if hasattr(part, 'text') else str(part) for part in text_parts])
                else:
                    text_content = str(text_parts)
            
            artifact = new_text_artifact(
                name="current_result",
                description="Result of request to agent.",
                text=text_content,
            )
            if data:
                artifact = new_data_artifact(
                    name="current_result",
                    description="Result of request to agent.",
                    data=data,
                )

            if require_user_input:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.input_required,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                text_content,
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            elif is_task_complete:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskArtifactUpdateEvent(
                        append=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                        lastChunk=True,
                        artifact=artifact,
                    )
                )
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(state=TaskState.completed),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            else:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.working,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                "Analyzing your text...",
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )

    async def cancel(self, context: RequestContext, event_queue: EventQueue) -> None:
        raise Exception("cancel not supported")

toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Marvin Agent Executor - Executor para o protocolo A2A
"""

import logging
import asyncio
from typing import AsyncIterable

from a2a.server.agent_execution import AgentExecutor, RequestContext
from a2a.server.events.event_queue import EventQueue
from a2a.types import (
    TaskArtifactUpdateEvent,
    TaskState,
    TaskStatus,
    TaskStatusUpdateEvent,
)
from a2a.utils import (
    new_agent_text_message,
    new_data_artifact,
    new_task,
    new_text_artifact,
)

from agent import MarvinAgent

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


class MarvinAgentExecutor(AgentExecutor):
    """
    Executor do Marvin Agent para o protocolo A2A
    """

    def __init__(self):
        self.agent = MarvinAgent()
        logger.info("MarvinAgentExecutor inicializado")

    async def execute(
        self,
        context: RequestContext,
        event_queue: EventQueue,
    ) -> None:
        query = context.get_user_input()
        task = context.current_task
        if not task:
            task = new_task(context.message)
            await event_queue.enqueue_event(task)

        async for item in self.agent.stream(query, task.contextId):
            is_task_complete = item["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = item["require_user_input"]
            text_parts = item.get("text_parts", [])

            logger.info(
                f"Stream item received: complete={is_task_complete}, require_input={require_user_input}, text_parts_len={len(str(text_parts))}"
            )

            agent_outcome = await self.agent.invoke(query, task.contextId)
            is_task_complete = agent_outcome["is_task_complete"]
            require_user_input = not is_task_complete
            text_parts = agent_outcome.get("text_parts", [])
            data = agent_outcome.get("data", {})
            
            # Converter text_parts para string
            text_content = ""
            if text_parts:
                if isinstance(text_parts, list):
                    text_content = "\n".join([part.text if hasattr(part, 'text') else str(part) for part in text_parts])
                else:
                    text_content = str(text_parts)
            
            artifact = new_text_artifact(
                name="current_result",
                description="Result of request to agent.",
                text=text_content,
            )
            if data:
                artifact = new_data_artifact(
                    name="current_result",
                    description="Result of request to agent.",
                    data=data,
                )

            if require_user_input:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.input_required,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                text_content,
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            elif is_task_complete:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskArtifactUpdateEvent(
                        append=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                        lastChunk=True,
                        artifact=artifact,
                    )
                )
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(state=TaskState.completed),
                        final=True,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )
            else:
                await event_queue.enqueue_event(
                    TaskStatusUpdateEvent(
                        status=TaskStatus(
                            state=TaskState.working,
                            message=new_agent_text_message(
                                "Analyzing your text...",
                                task.contextId,
                                task.id,
                            ),
                        ),
                        final=False,
                        contextId=task.contextId,
                        taskId=task.id,
                    )
                )

    async def cancel(self, context: RequestContext, event_queue: EventQueue) -> None:
        raise Exception("cancel not supported")

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o Turso Agent
Porta: 4243
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import TursoAgent
from agent_executor import TursoAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int) -> AgentCard:
    """Retorna o Agent Card para o TursoAgent seguindo padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(
        streaming=True,
        batch=True,
        persistence=True
    )
    
    skills = [
        AgentSkill(
            id="store_data",
            name="Armazenar Dados",
            description="Armazena dados de forma persistente com suporte a TTL",
            tags=["storage", "persistence", "database", "turso"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "store", "key": "user_123", "value": {"name": "JoÃ£o", "email": "joao@example.com"}}',
                "store campaign_data {'status': 'active', 'budget': 5000}",
                "salvar configuraÃ§Ãµes do agente"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="retrieve_data",
            name="Recuperar Dados",
            description="Recupera dados armazenados por chave",
            tags=["query", "fetch", "database", "turso"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "retrieve", "key": "user_123"}',
                "get campaign_data",
                "buscar configuraÃ§Ãµes"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="execute_query",
            name="Executar Query SQL",
            description="Executa queries SQL customizadas (apenas SELECT)",
            tags=["sql", "query", "database", "analytics"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "query", "sql": "SELECT * FROM agent_data WHERE agent_id = ?"}',
                "listar todas as chaves",
                "contar registros expirados"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="memory_sync",
            name="Sincronizar MemÃ³ria",
            description="Sincroniza memÃ³ria com outros agentes e Claude Flow",
            tags=["sync", "memory", "coordination", "claude-flow"],
            examples=[
                "sincronizar memÃ³ria do agente",
                "compartilhar contexto entre agentes",
                "persistir estado do workflow"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="batch_operations",
            name="OperaÃ§Ãµes em Lote",
            description="Executa mÃºltiplas operaÃ§Ãµes de forma otimizada",
            tags=["batch", "performance", "optimization"],
            examples=[
                "processar lista de dados",
                "importar mÃºltiplos registros",
                "atualizar vÃ¡rias chaves"
            ],
        )
    ]
    
    return AgentCard(
        name="Turso Persistence Agent",
        description="Agente A2A para persistÃªncia de dados usando Turso Database com suporte a SQL, TTL e sincronizaÃ§Ã£o",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="2.0.0",
        defaultInputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        defaultOutputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        capabilities=capabilities,
        skills=skills,
        metadata={
            "database": "Turso/LibSQL",
            "supports_ttl": True,
            "supports_sql": True,
            "supports_sync": True,
            "max_storage": "unlimited",
            "persistence": "durable"
        }
    )


def main():
    """Iniciar o servidor Turso Agent no padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    # ConfiguraÃ§Ãµes
    host = os.getenv("HOST", "localhost")
    port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 4243))
    
    print(f"ðŸš€ Iniciando Turso Agent (A2A) em {host}:{port}...")
    print(f"ðŸ“¦ Usando padrÃ£o A2A com SDK oficial")
    
    # Criar o agente
    agent = TursoAgent()
    
    # Criar o executor do agente
    agent_executor = TursoAgentExecutor(agent=agent)
    
    # Criar o handler de requisiÃ§Ãµes A2A
    request_handler = DefaultRequestHandler(
        agent_executor=agent_executor,
        task_store=InMemoryTaskStore(),
    )
    
    # Criar o servidor A2A
    server = A2AStarletteApplication(
        agent_card=get_agent_card(host, port),
        http_handler=request_handler
    )
    
    print("âœ… Servidor configurado com padrÃ£o A2A")
    print("ðŸ—„ï¸  Turso Database conectado")
    print("ðŸ”„ Suporte a streaming habilitado")
    print("ðŸ’¾ PersistÃªncia durÃ¡vel ativa")
    
    # Iniciar o servidor
    uvicorn.run(
        server.build(),
        host=host,
        port=port,
        log_level="info"
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o Turso Agent
Porta: 7001
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import TursoAgent
from agent_executor import TursoAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int) -> AgentCard:
    """Retorna o Agent Card para o TursoAgent seguindo padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(
        streaming=True,
        batch=True,
        persistence=True
    )
    
    skills = [
        AgentSkill(
            id="store_data",
            name="Armazenar Dados",
            description="Armazena dados de forma persistente com suporte a TTL",
            tags=["storage", "persistence", "database", "turso"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "store", "key": "user_123", "value": {"name": "JoÃ£o", "email": "joao@example.com"}}',
                "store campaign_data {'status': 'active', 'budget': 5000}",
                "salvar configuraÃ§Ãµes do agente"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="retrieve_data",
            name="Recuperar Dados",
            description="Recupera dados armazenados por chave",
            tags=["query", "fetch", "database", "turso"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "retrieve", "key": "user_123"}',
                "get campaign_data",
                "buscar configuraÃ§Ãµes"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="execute_query",
            name="Executar Query SQL",
            description="Executa queries SQL customizadas (apenas SELECT)",
            tags=["sql", "query", "database", "analytics"],
            examples=[
                '{"operation": "query", "sql": "SELECT * FROM agent_data WHERE agent_id = ?"}',
                "listar todas as chaves",
                "contar registros expirados"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="memory_sync",
            name="Sincronizar MemÃ³ria",
            description="Sincroniza memÃ³ria com outros agentes e Claude Flow",
            tags=["sync", "memory", "coordination", "claude-flow"],
            examples=[
                "sincronizar memÃ³ria do agente",
                "compartilhar contexto entre agentes",
                "persistir estado do workflow"
            ],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="batch_operations",
            name="OperaÃ§Ãµes em Lote",
            description="Executa mÃºltiplas operaÃ§Ãµes de forma otimizada",
            tags=["batch", "performance", "optimization"],
            examples=[
                "processar lista de dados",
                "importar mÃºltiplos registros",
                "atualizar vÃ¡rias chaves"
            ],
        )
    ]
    
    return AgentCard(
        name="Turso Persistence Agent",
        description="Agente A2A para persistÃªncia de dados usando Turso Database com suporte a SQL, TTL e sincronizaÃ§Ã£o",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="2.0.0",
        defaultInputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        defaultOutputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        capabilities=capabilities,
        skills=skills,
        metadata={
            "database": "Turso/LibSQL",
            "supports_ttl": True,
            "supports_sql": True,
            "supports_sync": True,
            "max_storage": "unlimited",
            "persistence": "durable"
        }
    )


def main():
    """Iniciar o servidor Turso Agent no padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    # ConfiguraÃ§Ãµes
    host = os.getenv("HOST", "localhost")
    port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 4243))
    
    print(f"ðŸš€ Iniciando Turso Agent (A2A) em {host}:{port}...")
    print(f"ðŸ“¦ Usando padrÃ£o A2A com SDK oficial")
    
    # Criar o agente
    agent = TursoAgent()
    
    # Criar o executor do agente
    agent_executor = TursoAgentExecutor(agent=agent)
    
    # Criar o handler de requisiÃ§Ãµes A2A
    request_handler = DefaultRequestHandler(
        agent_executor=agent_executor,
        task_store=InMemoryTaskStore(),
    )
    
    # Criar o servidor A2A
    server = A2AStarletteApplication(
        agent_card=get_agent_card(host, port),
        http_handler=request_handler
    )
    
    print("âœ… Servidor configurado com padrÃ£o A2A")
    print("ðŸ—„ï¸  Turso Database conectado")
    print("ðŸ”„ Suporte a streaming habilitado")
    print("ðŸ’¾ PersistÃªncia durÃ¡vel ativa")
    
    # Iniciar o servidor
    uvicorn.run(
        server.build(),
        host=host,
        port=port,
        log_level="info"
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o A2A-Estudo Agent
Porta: 8001
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import A2AEstudoAgent
from agent_executor import A2AEstudoAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill
